post.body: LOL I got DDR :D :D <3
Wait... It's supposed to *rain* on Christmas!? >.<
Still 45 min til church and its half full... Twitter is all i have right now. =)
How come so many people magically "find the light" om xmas. Church is tooooo crowded :P
i want a christmas that involves a log cabin, tons of snow, and absolutely no distant relatives. & idc what you think. :P
Eeeehhh. I just wanna sleep allll day.
i be loving me subberz http://tinyurl.com/7trvgz
it's Christmas Eve Eve!! xD
how come it's allowed to snow in vegas, but not pittsburgh? not even a little bit?
is it bad that computer + lava lamp + desk lamp = burning smell?
my lava lamp for this http://tinyurl.com/7grmow is taking way to long to warm up...
It's 6 degrees outside (>.<)
I just got 20 subbers! I know it's small compared to most, but ahhh I love em <3 http://twitpic.com/v59o
Burning some good old fashioned CDs ^.^
finishing up christmas gifts! :D
genuinely bored...
watching The Exorcism of Emily Rose. haha free on demand movies ftw. ;D
Just looked through my 8th grade yearbook. LOL I'm so glad I'm done with that crap!
OMG I SUCCESSFULLY BAKED CHRISTMAS STUFF WITHOUT BURNING ANYTHING! sorry for screaming kthnxbai
I don't wanna jinx it, but I haven't burnt anything yet...
